Create a Lesson

Source: R/make_lesson.R
create_lesson.Rd

Create a Lesson

create_lesson(
  lesson_name,
  course_dir = ".",
  verbose = TRUE,
  md_file = NULL,
  make_slide_deck = TRUE,
  slide_id = NULL,
  extract_code = FALSE,
  rmd = extract_code,
  open = FALSE,
  template_slide_id = "143gvqcynq_bl7iVd2G9yjumwJJkAy0S6CyNCsrJ2LgE",
  publish = TRUE,
  add_number = TRUE,
  use_google_drive = FALSE,
  ...
)

create_lessons_from_book(
  course_dir = ".",
  verbose = TRUE,
  make_slide_deck = FALSE,
  ...
)

Arguments

lesson_name

Name of the Lesson to create. This should be human-readable and will be the title of your lesson in your course.
course_dir

directory with course materials
verbose

print diagnostic messages
md_file

Output markdown file to create. If not specified, will take the lesson_name, sub out spaces, lower case it, and use that for the file name.
make_slide_deck

Create a slide deck on Google Slides if no link is provided.
slide_id

ID to slide deck on Google Slides. Caution, this will publish the slide deck to the web.
extract_code

If you have text with #rstats in the slide or #rstats in the Alt-text title, code will be included
rmd

Should an Rmd (Rmarkdown) be made versus a Markdown?
open

should the file be opened for editing?
template_slide_id

Slide ID for a template. This template will be copied to your new slide deck.
publish

should the slide be published so slides can be included in the markdown?
add_number

Add a prefix to the file name, such as `00_` for the first file
use_google_drive

passed to gs_slide_df to call gs_to_drive_pngs when putting in PNGs into the lesson.
...

arguments passed to check_didactr_auth

Value

A list of the created markdown manuscript file and script files. create_lessons_from_book will return a list of these lists, one for each lesson in the Book.txt file.

Examples

root_path = tempfile()
course_name = "test"
sc = create_course(course_name, root_path)

#> ✔ Setting active project to '/private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpUTiJRp/filedda83ae7d3cf/test'
#> Creating missing /private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpUTiJRp/filedda83ae7d3cf/test/scripts directory
#> Creating missing /private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpUTiJRp/filedda83ae7d3cf/test/manuscript/resources directory
#> Creating missing /private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpUTiJRp/filedda83ae7d3cf/test/manuscript/resources/images directory
#> Creating missing /private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpUTiJRp/filedda83ae7d3cf/test/manuscript/resources/videos directory
#> Creating missing /private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpUTiJRp/filedda83ae7d3cf/test/metrics directory
#> ✔ Writing 'test.Rproj'
#> ✔ Adding '.Rproj.user' to '.gitignore'
#> ✔ Adding 'manuscript/resources/videos' to '.gitignore'
#> ✔ Setting active project to '<no active project>'
verbose = TRUE
out =create_lesson(lesson_name = "how to Do Things",
course_dir = sc$course_dir,
make_slide_deck = FALSE,
open = FALSE)
dir(sc$man_path)

#> [1] "00_how_to_do_things.md" "Book.txt"               "resources"             
dir(sc$scr_path)

#> [1] "00_how_to_do_things_script.md"
readLines(sc$book_txt, warn = FALSE)

#> [1] "00_how_to_do_things.md"
readLines(out$md_file)

#>  [1] ""

in_ci <- function() {
nzchar(Sys.getenv("CI"))
}
if (FALSE) {
# requires authorization
root_path = tempfile()
course_name = "test"
sc = create_course(course_name, root_path)
verbose = TRUE
out = create_lesson(lesson_name = "how to Do Things",
course_dir = sc$course_dir,
make_slide_deck = !in_ci(),
open = interactive())
dir(sc$man_path)
dir(sc$scr_path)
readLines(sc$book_txt, warn = FALSE)
readLines(out$md_file, warn = FALSE)
}

root_path = tempfile()
course_name = "test"
sc = create_course(course_name, root_path)

#> ✔ Setting active project to '/private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpUTiJRp/filedda84a02d93f/test'
#> Creating missing /private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpUTiJRp/filedda84a02d93f/test/scripts directory
#> Creating missing /private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpUTiJRp/filedda84a02d93f/test/manuscript/resources directory
#> Creating missing /private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpUTiJRp/filedda84a02d93f/test/manuscript/resources/images directory
#> Creating missing /private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpUTiJRp/filedda84a02d93f/test/manuscript/resources/videos directory
#> Creating missing /private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpUTiJRp/filedda84a02d93f/test/metrics directory
#> ✔ Writing 'test.Rproj'
#> ✔ Adding '.Rproj.user' to '.gitignore'
#> ✔ Adding 'manuscript/resources/videos' to '.gitignore'
#> ✔ Setting active project to '<no active project>'
verbose = TRUE
x =  system.file("extdata", "Book.txt", package = "didactr")
file.copy(x, sc$book_txt, overwrite = TRUE)

#> [1] TRUE
course_dir = sc$course_dir
res = create_lessons_from_book(course_dir = sc$course_dir, open = FALSE,
make_slide_deck = FALSE
)
dir(sc$man_path)

#>  [1] "00_types.md"         "01_reports.md"       "02_presentations.md"
#>  [4] "03_general.md"       "04_technical.md"     "05_blogpost.md"     
#>  [7] "06_meetings.md"      "07_one_on_one.md"    "08_notebook.md"     
#> [10] "09_graphs.md"        "Book.txt"            "resources"          
dir(sc$scr_path)

#>  [1] "00_types_script.md"         "01_reports_script.md"      
#>  [3] "02_presentations_script.md" "03_general_script.md"      
#>  [5] "04_technical_script.md"     "05_blogpost_script.md"     
#>  [7] "06_meetings_script.md"      "07_one_on_one_script.md"   
#>  [9] "08_notebook_script.md"      "09_graphs_script.md"       
readLines(sc$book_txt)

#> [10] "09_graphs.md"                        
readLines(res[[3]]$md_file)
